message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_FV_ANONYMOUS
message.locale: A real name must be entered when converting a prospect person to a person. The first name cannot be 'Anonymous'.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ANONYMOUS
message.locale: A real address must be entered when converting a prospect person to a person. The address cannot be 'Anonymous'.

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CANCELED
message.locale: A public office with status of 'Canceled' cannot be selected.
A public office with status of 'Cancelled' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CLOSED
message.locale: A public office with office status of 'Closed' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSON_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: The details of aÂ client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.
